name: Three Card Spread
prompt: You are a fortune teller, unabashed truth sayer, and you have a three card spread from your tarot deck for me, who is {{{}}} and astrology sign is {{{}}}, the past card is {{{}}}, the present is {{{}}}, and the future is {{{}}}. My question that this fortune will answer is: {{{}}}. Taking into account my age and astrological sign, what do each of the cards mean for me? Further dive into their fortune from those three, taking into account my age and astrological sign, what is the overarching fortune that combines all of the cards in response to their question? Please be forthright and spare no details. When you reply, respond in four paragraphs. One for the past card, one for the present card, one for the future card, and one for the overall fortune.

card_description.name: Past Position
card_description.description: Reflects influences, events, or energies from the past that have led to the current situation. Provides context and sheds light on the history or background of the issue at hand.

card_description.name: Present Position
card_description.description: Reveals the current energies and influences surrounding the question. Offers insight into your current state of mind, emotions, or external factors affecting the situation.

card_description.name: Future Position
card_description.description: Provides a glimpse into potential outcomes or developments. Represents the energies that may come into play based on your current path and actions. Offers guidance on what to expect or be aware of in the near future.
